testcase.name: The notification list on the navbar displays the product
testcase.system-out: Given the buyer negotiates for a product....................................passed And the seller is logged in QAE10_GR03_seller@binar.com 4IKJKomARpjPH7aiyRZ0CQ==.passed When clicks on the "Notifikasi" button......................................passed And the notification on the navbar displays the product name, price Rp 5.000.000 and offer amount Rp 3.000.000.passed

testcase.name: The notification list page displays the product
testcase.system-out: When the seller clicks on the "Penawaran produk" notification...............passed Then the notification list displays the product name, price Rp 5.000.000 and offer amount Rp 3.000.000.passed

testcase.name: The seller accepts a product offer
testcase.system-out: When the seller clicks on the "Terima" button...............................passed Then the the negotiated product item displays "Penawaran produk diterima" text.passed And the the negotiated product item displays "Status" and "Hubungi di" button.passed

testcase.name: The seller cancels a product offer
testcase.system-out: When the seller clicks "Status" button......................................passed And the seller clicks "Batalkan transaksi" button and clicks "Kirim"........passed Then the the negotiated product item displays "Penjualan dibatalkan" text...passed
